Come meet other local R-Ladies and hear Carissa Shafto speak about her use of R for data science at the Galen College of Nursing. Vist our [Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/rladies-newyork/events/235073330/) page for more details and to RSVP.

Host: [RGGI Inc.](https://www.rggi.org/rggi)
